De proefles van :student_first_name met: The trial lesson of :student_first_name with :host_first_name was a success! This means that :student_first_name now officially gets support from :host_first_name.
De vakafspraken zijn definitief. Dat bet: The subject agreements are final. This means that lessons with :student_first_name will be scheduled every month according to these agreements. The subject agreements apply for a certain period. During the evaluation meeting, it will be assessed whether they need to be extended, modified, or terminated. This way, our support better meets the needs of the student.
U kunt de begeleiding volgen in onze web: You can follow the support in our web app. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

We werken met onze eigen webapp. Hiermee: We work with our own web app. This gives you access to the lessons, lesson reports, and other information regarding your support. You will be kept informed through automatically generated emails. This way, our support becomes even faster, more transparent, and more tailored to the needs of the student.

Bij Studied vinden we het contact met de: At Studied, we consider contact with the student's mentor and teacher to be just as important as contact with the student themselves, so we can support each student according to their needs. Feel free to contact us if you notice any new issues or have recommended practice materials!
We hopen u hiermee voldoende geïnformeer: We hope this has sufficiently informed you. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us!

Waar zie je mogelijkheden voor groei of: Where do you see opportunities for growth or improvement?
Waar zie je eventuele obstakels of uitda: Where do you see possible obstacles or challenges?
Wat heeft jouw voorkeur met betrekking t: What is your preference regarding learning methods (visual, adaptive, practical exercises)?
Bij welke vakken kunnen we je ondersteun: Which subjects can we support you with? And how are your other subjects?
Wat heeft jouw voorkeur voor ondersteuni: What is your preference for support with the subjects: structural tutoring or individual lessons?
Studeer / werk je liever in een groep of: Do you prefer to study/work in a group or individually?
Wil je de lessen in persoon of digitaal: Do you want to attend the lessons in person or digitally? It can also be both, as long as we know your preference.
Hoe kan jij (en uiteraard wij) rekening: How can you (and of course we) take these obstacles or challenges into account?
Zijn er aanpassingen of aanvullingen die: Are there any adjustments or additions you would like to suggest for our plan of action?
Welke afspraken worden er gemaakt over d: What agreements are made about the subjects?
Welke afspraken worden er gemaakt over h: What agreements are made about the minimum number of hours?
Welke afspraken worden er gemaakt over d: What agreements are made about the support: structural tutoring or individual lessons?
Studeer / werk je liever in een groep of: Do you prefer to study/work in a group or individually? It can also be both (as long as we know your preference).
Wil je de lessen in persoon of digitaal: Do you want to attend the lessons in person or digitally? It can also be both (as long as we know your preference).
Indien de voorkeur uitgaat naar lessen i: If the preference is for lessons in person, WHERE (location) will the lessons take place?
Hoe communiceert de leerling / student m: How does the student communicate with the student-tutor (WhatsApp or email)?
Hoe houden de ouder(s) / verzorger(s) en: How do the parent(s) / guardian(s) and team leaders stay in touch (WhatsApp or email)?
Wanneer vindt het evaluatiegesprek plaat: When will the evaluation meeting take place? In this meeting, the implementation of the agreements will be evaluated.
Welke afspraken worden er gemaakt over h: What agreements are made about providing study materials / the material to the student-tutor (preferably 48 hours in advance)?
Student-docent en de leerling / student: Student-tutor and the student exchange phone numbers.
Hoe tevreden ben je met de ondersteuning: How satisfied are you with the support and progress so far?
Heb je het doel (of doelen), dat we same: Have you achieved the goal (or goals) that we have set together? If so, how do you know? If not, what do you think the obstacles or challenges were?
Hoe goed sluit de huidige aanpak aan bij: How well does the current approach match your learning style?
Welke ondersteuning en hulpmiddelen ware: Which support and tools were most valuable to you?
Zijn er dingen die je minder of niet eff: Are there things you found less or not effective?
Wat zou je willen veranderen?: What would you like to change?
Hoe tevreden zijn de ouder(s) / verzorge: How satisfied are the parent(s) / guardian(s) with the support and progress so far?
Hoe ervaart de klant ervaren de ouder(s): How does the customer experience the parent(s) / guardian(s) the support for achieving the goal?
Willen we de begeleiding verlengen, even: Do we want to extend the support, possibly modify it, or do we want to stop the support? If extending or possibly modifying, when will the evaluation meeting take place? In this meeting, the implementation of the agreements will be evaluated.

You can open it in the app by clicking the button below.
Vakafspraak :agreement (losse lessen) va: Subject agreement :agreement (individual lessons) of :employee has not scheduled any lessons after 7 days. Click here to go to this subject agreement.
Wat moet ik doen als een leerling niet o: What should I do if a student doesn’t respond to my texts?
Als een leerling niet reageert, wacht 24: If a student isn’t replying, wait 24 hours for the student to respond. If there’s still no response, after 24 hours you sent the message to the student, inform your Team Leader so they can follow up with the student/parents. Don’t let communication drop silently, as this may become a (bad) habit. As for all, the delay of the student will be reported in the Studied app.
Wat moet ik doen als ik op uitwisseling: What happens if I go on exchange or start an internship?
Geef het zo vroeg mogelijk door aan HR e: Let HR and your Team Leader know as early as possible. Together, we’ll check if you can keep your students, hand them over temporarily, or wrap up your lessons before leaving. Always give advance notice, don’t wait until the last moment.
Wat moet ik doen als een leerling niet g: What should I do if a student isn’t motivated?
Blijf geduldig en bemoedigend. Probeer t: Stay patient and encouraging. Try to understand what’s blocking them (stress, unclear goals, difficulty with material). Use your lesson reports to reflect on motivation. If it continues, discuss it with your [Team Leader](https://wa.me/31613169929). You’re not alone in solving this!
Hoe bereid ik me voor op het intakegespr: How should I prepare for the intake interview or trial lesson?
Het intakegesprek wordt geleid door de T: The intake interview is led by the *Team Leader* to meet the student and set up the *Plan of Action (PoA)*. The trial lesson is your first teaching moment with the student. Watch the onboarding video again to refresh the structure. If you have any doubts, you can always contact the Team Leader.
Wat moet ik doen als ik de avond vóór ee: What should I do if I get sick the night before a lesson?
Informeer je leerling meteen en laat het: Inform your student right away and also let your Team Leader know. Be proactive in suggesting a new time to reschedule. Never just cancel without communicating. Transparency builds trust!
Als je meerdere banen hebt, moet je zelf:
If you have multiple jobs, you need to decide yourself where you want to apply the tax reduction. It’s usually smartest to apply it at the job where you earn the most.

If you want to change your tax reduction status at Studied, let us know. We can switch it on or off for you. Please contact Sarah of Finance via email or simply send a text on WhatsApp.
You will receive these via Exact in your email. Don't forget to check your spam folder!

If you need a copy or cannot access them, just let Sarah of Finance (https://wa.me/31616018566) know and she’ll provide it for you.
Betalingen worden gedaan op de 14e van d:
Payments are made on the *14th of the following month*. For example: lessons taught in September will be paid on October 14th.

Please keep in mind that bank processing times can cause slight delays. If for any reason payment will be on a different date, we will inform you in advance.
